titles.title: Service Members' Homebuyer Tax Credit Extension Act 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the first-time homebuyer tax credit for members of the Armed Forces and certain Federal employees serving on extended duty.
Service Members' Homebuyer Tax Credit Extension Act 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: Service Members' Homebuyer Tax Credit Extension Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the first-time homebuyer tax credit and related provisions through November 30, 2009, for members of the uniformed services, members of the Foreign Service of the United States, and employees of the intelligence community serving on official extended duty outside the United States for at least 180 days in 2009.
